recommendations: Byron is an exceptionally talented individual who has a knack of delivering projects to a consistently high standard. During our time working together at Ogilvy on Allianz’ global sponsorship portfolio, I was impressed by his ability to manage multiple workstreams and deliverables while creating an environment that gets the best out of the team. I also enjoyed his fun nature in the office and chats about the golf rounds that got away from us!

summary: Senior executive with 25+ years in the automotive industry as well as in the sports business working internationally in leading roles with and for sponsors, agencies, associations and clubs.Properties managed include FIFA World Cup, UEFA Champions League, Formula One, World Rally Championship and selected Deutsche Fußball Liga clubs.Capabilities include sponsorship marketing and sales, strategic planning, partnership management, contract negotiations, brand experiences, digital and social media, event management, measurement and analytics.
